descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Fly 17 legendary U.S. warplanes around your room in mixed-reality or experience them at actual size!  Fire guns, missiles, and bombs to destroy targets.

All models are finely-detailed and scaled to 1:48.  They have proportionally-accurate flight characteristics that are carefully tuned for living-room sized gameplay (air-density is thick like water, gravity adjusted, etc.)

Planes  included:
• B-17G Flying Fortress
• P-38J Lightning
• P-51D Mustang
• F4U-1C Corsair
• F-86E Sabre
• F-4C Phantom II
• SR-71A Blackbird
• F-14A Tomcat
• F-15E Strike Eagle
• A-10C Thunderbolt II
• F-16C Fighting Falcon
• F/A-18F Super Hornet
• F-117A Nighthawk
• YF-23
• F-22 Raptor
• F-35A Lightning II
• B-21 Raider

Designed for a single controller:
• Button A/X: next plane (long-press for menu)
• Button B/Y: toggle weapons-mode (long-press to toggle scale)
• Trigger: forward thrust
• Thumbstick button: afterburner (if available)
• Thumbstick: (model-scale) plane pitch/yaw, (full-scale) move player & snap-turn
• Grip: grab plane
• You can move/rotate up to twice as fast with a second controller.

Destroyable targets are contained within your physical room if you scan it in Quest Environment setup, otherwise a generic space is used.
